title: Need help pairing Fabian de Lange's typeface "Eclectic" with a serif for body copy and a san serif for titles.
content:
Hey Typophiles!  
I am doing some personal branding and fell in love with Fabian De Lange's typeface Eclectic, my only problem with it is that I am having quite a bit of trouble pairing it with a serif and a san serif for body and title copy, I've copied some links to show Eclectic. I am open to any suggestions! Thanks so much guys and have a great one!

[http://luc.devroye.org/FabianDelange-Eclectic-2011.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417081918/http:/luc.devroye.org/FabianDelange-Eclectic-2011.jpg "http://luc.devroye.org/FabianDelange-Eclectic-2011.jpg")  
 [http://freetypography.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/electic.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417081918/http:/freetypography.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/electic.jpg "http://freetypography.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/electic.jpg")
author: Paige Whitaker

comments.content: You seem so down to adventure.
